## Description

Brief description of the changes made to detection rules.

## Type of Change

- [ ] New detection rule
- [ ] Modification to existing rule

## Detection Rule Changes

### New/Modified Rules
- [ ] Rule name follows naming convention: `[ORG] â€“ <Thing Detected> (T####[#.###])`
- [ ] ATT&CK techniques properly mapped

- [ ] Incident configuration reviewed
- [ ] Data sources documented

### Query Review
- [ ] Query syntax validated
- [ ] Performance considerations addressed
- [ ] False positive rate assessed
- [ ] Tested in Dev environment
- [ ] Query logic reviewed by team

### Security Review
- [ ] Threat model considered
- [ ] Coverage gaps identified
- [ ] Integration with existing rules reviewed
- [ ] Incident response impact assessed

## Testing

### Dev Environment
- [ ] Bicep templates build successfully
- [ ] What-if deployment completed
- [ ] Rules deployed and enabled
- [ ] No critical errors in logs
- [ ] Query returns expected results

### Validation
- [ ] Smoke tests passed
- [ ] Performance acceptable
- [ ] Incident creation working
- [ ] Alert grouping configured correctly

## Checklist

### Pre-Merge
- [ ] All checks passing
- [ ] Code review completed
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Testing completed
- [ ] Security review passed

### Post-Merge
- [ ] Monitor Dev deployment
- [ ] Verify rule enablement
- [ ] Check for errors
- [ ] Validate incident creation
- [ ] Performance monitoring
